displayProperties.description: Conjure a well of power that continuously heals those inside it.
displayProperties.name: Healing Rift

displayProperties.description: Conjure a well of power that increases weapon damage for those inside it.
displayProperties.name: Empowering Rift

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with strong directional control.
displayProperties.name: Strafe Glide

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with a strong initial boost of speed.
displayProperties.name: Burst Glide

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with both moderate speed and directional control.
displayProperties.name: Balanced Glide

displayProperties.description: A grenade that calls down a focused lightning storm.
displayProperties.name: Storm Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that chains bolts of lightning to nearby enemies.
displayProperties.name: Arcbolt Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that periodically damages enemies inside its explosion radius.
displayProperties.name: Pulse Grenade

displayProperties.description: Chain Arc Lightning from your hands and electrify enemies with devastating streams of Arc Light that intensify over time.
displayProperties.name: Stormtrance

displayProperties.description: This electrocuting Melee ability chains lightning from the struck target to nearby enemies.
displayProperties.name: Chain Lightning

displayProperties.description: When cast with full grenade and melee energy, Stormtrance lasts longer and fully restores Health.
displayProperties.name: Transcendence

displayProperties.description: Enemies damaged by your Grenades  chain deadly lightning to nearby enemies. Each grenade or melee chain returns grenade energy.
displayProperties.name: Arc Web

displayProperties.description: Activate to teleport during Stormtrance.
displayProperties.name: Ionic Blink

displayProperties.description: This electrocuting melee ability recharges your Super, grenade, and melee energy.
displayProperties.name: Rising Storm

displayProperties.description: On casting Stormtrance, fire a bolt of lightning into the ground, creating a devastating shockwave under you.
displayProperties.name: Landfall

displayProperties.description: Your Rift lasts longer. It charges faster and you run faster when allies are near.
displayProperties.name: Electrostatic Surge

displayProperties.description: Your Rift now grants you or any ally that uses it an Arc Soul to aid in battle.
displayProperties.name: Arc Soul

displayProperties.description:
Unleash a long-range channeled beam of concentrated Arc energy.
[Super]  : Use while active to deactivate Chaos Reach early and save Super energy.
displayProperties.name: Chaos Reach

displayProperties.description: Fire an Arc projectile that travels forward and releases a perpendicular bolt of lightning.
displayProperties.name: Ball Lightning

displayProperties.description: Defeating enemies has a chance to create Ionic Traces. Collecting Ionic Traces grants energy to all your abilities.
displayProperties.name: Ionic Trace

displayProperties.description: Being critically wounded triggers an energy wave that boosts yours and allies' speed.
displayProperties.name: Pulsewave

displayProperties.description: Conjure a well of power that continuously heals those inside it.
displayProperties.name: Healing Rift

displayProperties.description: Conjure a well of power that increases weapon damage for those inside it.
displayProperties.name: Empowering Rift

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with strong directional control.
displayProperties.name: Strafe Glide

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with a strong initial boost of speed.
displayProperties.name: Burst Glide

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with both moderate speed and directional control.
displayProperties.name: Balanced Glide

displayProperties.description: An explosive grenade that attaches to enemies.
displayProperties.name: Fusion Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that creates a flare of Solar Light that continuously damages enemies trapped inside.
displayProperties.name: Solar Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that unleashes bolts of Solar Light at nearby enemies.
displayProperties.name: Firebolt Grenade

displayProperties.description: Weave Solar Light into blades and smite your foes from the skies.
displayProperties.name: Daybreak

displayProperties.description: Send out a spiral of three explosive Solar energy blasts.
displayProperties.name: Celestial Fire

displayProperties.description:
Fire weapons, send Celestial Fire, and throw grenades while gliding.

Airborne final blows extend the effects of Heat Rises and grant melee energy.
displayProperties.name: Winged Sun

displayProperties.description: [Grenade]  : Consume your grenade energy to extend Glide time and improve in-air accuracy.
displayProperties.name: Heat Rises

displayProperties.description:
Activate while midair to dodge.

Gain an additional dodge while under the effects of Heat Rises.
displayProperties.name: Icarus Dash

displayProperties.description: Strike a combatant with this melee ability to burn them. Defeating burning combatants causes them to explode.
displayProperties.name: Igniting Touch

displayProperties.description: Daybreak projectiles seek targets as they travel and, upon impact, launch a streak of deadly flames.
displayProperties.name: Fated for the Flame

displayProperties.description: Killing an enemy with Daybreak extends its duration.
displayProperties.name: Everlasting Fire

displayProperties.description: Activate while midair to quickly descend and restore your health. While Daybreak is active, descend causes explosive damage and returns Super energy.
displayProperties.name: Phoenix Dive

displayProperties.description: Thrust your Daybreak Sword into the ground. The Sword continuously projects a powerful aura that heals and empowers nearby allies, increasing their weapon damage and protecting them from the effects of Stasis.
displayProperties.name: Well of Radiance

displayProperties.description: Strike an enemy with this melee ability to inflict burn damage and empower yourself and nearby allies.
displayProperties.name: Guiding Flame

displayProperties.description: [Grenade]  : Convert your grenade into a Blessing that heals ally targets and drops overshields you and your allies can pick up. Activate Divine Protection while Gliding to hover in midair.
displayProperties.name: Divine Protection

displayProperties.description: Healing or empowering allies regenerates your grenade, melee, and Rift energy.
displayProperties.name: Benevolent Dawn

displayProperties.description: Dodge to perform an evasive maneuver with a steady hand. Dodging automatically reloads your weapon.
displayProperties.name: Marksman's Dodge

displayProperties.description: Dodge to perform a deft tumble, avoiding enemy attacks. Dodging near enemies fully recharges your Melee Ability.
displayProperties.name: Gambler's Dodge

displayProperties.description: While airborne, Jump a second time to reach greater heights.
displayProperties.name: High Jump

displayProperties.description: While airborne, Jump a second time with strong directional control.
displayProperties.name: Strafe Jump

displayProperties.description: While airborne, sustain your air control with a second or third Jump.
displayProperties.name: Triple Jump

displayProperties.description: A grenade that creates a horizontal wall of burning Void Light.
displayProperties.name: Voidwall Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that creates a vortex which continually damages enemies trapped inside.
displayProperties.name: Vortex Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that attaches to any surface and emits a torrent of damaging Void Light.
displayProperties.name: Spike Grenade

displayProperties.description: Tether foes to a Void Anchor, slowing, weakening and suppressing them for you and your allies.
displayProperties.name: Shadowshot

displayProperties.description: Throw a Smoke Bomb from a distance with this Melee Ability. The Smoke Bomb sticks to surfaces and detonates when enemies are near, slowing and disorienting them.
displayProperties.name: Snare Bomb

displayProperties.description: Sprint and Sneak faster, and gain an enhanced Tracker. Tethered enemies are marked for easy tracking.
displayProperties.name: Keen Scout

displayProperties.description: The Void Anchors fired from Shadowshot become traps and wait for prey. Void Anchors have increased range and last longer.
displayProperties.name: Deadfall

displayProperties.description: Dodging makes you vanish from sight for a short time.
displayProperties.name: Vanishing Step

displayProperties.description: Throw a Smoke Bomb from a distance, making you and nearby allies invisible and providing the Heart of the Pack buff. Heart of the Pack grants weapon haste and increases mobility, recovery, and resilience.
displayProperties.name: Vanish in Smoke

displayProperties.description: Grenade effects last twice as long, allowing for strong territorial control and increased damage potential.
displayProperties.name: Lockdown

displayProperties.description: Damaging enemies with grenades grants melee ability energy. Making allies invisible grants grenade energy.
displayProperties.name: Combat Provision

displayProperties.description: Fire Shadowshot multiple times in rapid succession. Shadowshot deals massive damage against tethered targets. Defeating tethered targets creates Orbs of Power and grants nearby allies the Heart of the Pack buff.
displayProperties.name: Moebius Quiver

displayProperties.description:
Summon a pair of deadly Void blades and stalk the battlefield in a veil of shadows.
[Light Attack]  : Perform a quick melee attack.
[Heavy Attack]  : Perform a heavy attack and once again vanish from sight.
displayProperties.name: Spectral Blades

displayProperties.description: Throw a Smoke Bomb from a distance with this melee ability. The Smoke Bomb slows enemies and damages them over time.
displayProperties.name: Corrosive Smoke

displayProperties.description: While crouched, precision kills grant invisibility, Truesight, and increased melee range.
displayProperties.name: Flawless Execution

displayProperties.description: After performing a Flawless Execution, your melee attacks weaken enemies.
displayProperties.name: Shattering Strike

displayProperties.description: Create a large barrier that can be used to reinforce a position with cover from enemy fire.
displayProperties.name: Towering Barricade

displayProperties.description: Create a small barrier that you can peek over while aiming down sights and that increases weapon reload speed, stability, and range when you stand behind it.
displayProperties.name: Rally Barricade

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air at greater heights.
displayProperties.name: High Lift

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air with strong directional control.
displayProperties.name: Strafe Lift

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air with a strong initial burst of momentum.
displayProperties.name: Catapult Lift

displayProperties.description: An explosive grenade that suppresses, preventing enemies from using abilities for a short time.
displayProperties.name: Suppressor Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that attaches to enemies and explodes twice.
displayProperties.name: Magnetic Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that creates a horizontal wall of burning Void Light.
displayProperties.name: Voidwall Grenade

displayProperties.description:
[Super]  : Summon a shield of Void Light. 
While Sentinel Shield is active:
[Light Attack]  : Attack.
[Block]  : Block.
[Grenade]  : Perform a Shield Throw.
displayProperties.name: Sentinel Shield

displayProperties.description: Defeat an enemy with this melee ability to create an overshield around you and nearby allies. Final blows grant melee energy when this overshield is active.
displayProperties.name: Defensive Strike

displayProperties.description: Melee kills restore Health for you and nearby allies.
displayProperties.name: Rallying Force

displayProperties.description: Your Overshield from Defensive Strike lasts longer and increases melee damage and reload speed.
displayProperties.name: Turn the Tide

displayProperties.description: When Super energy is full, create an indestructible dome to protect you and your allies. Passing through Ward of Dawn grants you and your allies a temporary increase to weapon damage.
displayProperties.name: Ward of Dawn

displayProperties.description: After sprinting for a short time, use this melee ability to unleash a devastating Shield Bash that disorients enemies and suppresses the target of Shield Bash.
displayProperties.name: Shield Bash

displayProperties.description: Grenade kills recharge your Grenade energy.
displayProperties.name: Superior Arsenal

displayProperties.description: Kills while surrounded by enemies reduce the cooldown of your Super.
displayProperties.name: In the Trenches

displayProperties.description: Gain an additional Shield Throw charge while Sentinel Shield is active.
displayProperties.name: Second Shield

displayProperties.description: Guard with Sentinel Shield to create a defensive wall. Allies who shoot through the wall have increased weapon damage, and Guarding allies makes the shield last longer.
displayProperties.name: Banner Shield

displayProperties.description: Strike an enemyÂ with this melee ability to cause a Void explosion.
displayProperties.name: Tactical Strike

displayProperties.description: Hit a target with a Void ability to attach a Void detonator. Further hits cause the detonator to explode, dealing damage to surrounding targets.
displayProperties.name: Controlled Demolition

displayProperties.description: You and nearby allies regain health as well as grenade and melee energy when your Void detonators explode.
displayProperties.name: Resupply

displayProperties.description: Create a large barrier that can be used to reinforce a position with cover from enemy fire.
displayProperties.name: Towering Barricade

displayProperties.description: Create a small barrier that you can peek over while aiming down sights and that increases weapon reload speed, stability, and range when you stand behind it.
displayProperties.name: Rally Barricade

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air at greater heights.
displayProperties.name: High Lift

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air with strong directional control.
displayProperties.name: Strafe Lift

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air with a strong initial burst of momentum.
displayProperties.name: Catapult Lift

displayProperties.description: An explosive grenade that attaches to enemies.
displayProperties.name: Fusion Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that sets enemies on fire when it explodes.
displayProperties.name: Incendiary Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that sends forward a burning line of fire.
displayProperties.name: Thermite Grenade

displayProperties.description: Summon a flaming hammer and wreak destruction down upon your enemies.
displayProperties.name: Hammer of Sol

displayProperties.description: While sprinting, use this Melee Ability to swing a blazing hammer that weakens enemies.
displayProperties.name: Hammer Strike

displayProperties.description: Solar ability kills grant you and nearby allies bonus movement and reload speed.
displayProperties.name: Tempered Metal

displayProperties.description: Enemies killed by Hammer of Sol explode.
displayProperties.name: Explosive Pyre

displayProperties.description: Hammers shatter into explosive molten embers on impact.
displayProperties.name: Vulcan's Rage

displayProperties.description: Strike an enemy with this melee ability to release a Solar explosion, setting nearby enemies on fire.
displayProperties.name: Mortar Blast

displayProperties.description: Solar ability kills restore your health. Grenade, melee ability, and Sun Warrior kills leave a deadly Sunspot in their wake.
displayProperties.name: Sol Invictus

displayProperties.description: Passing through a Sunspot causes your grenade and melee abilities to recharge faster and your Super to last longer. It also increases the damage your weapons deal.
displayProperties.name: Sun Warrior

displayProperties.description: Hammers create a Sunspot on impact. While standing in Sunspots, you throw Hammers faster.
displayProperties.name: Endless Siege

displayProperties.description: Summon a flaming maul and crush enemies with the force of an earthquake.
displayProperties.name: Burning Maul

displayProperties.description: Throw a hammer from a distance. After throwing it, picking up the hammer fully recharges your melee ability.
displayProperties.name: Throwing Hammer

displayProperties.description: After hitting an enemy with your Throwing Hammer, picking up the hammer triggers your health regeneration.
displayProperties.name: Tireless Warrior

displayProperties.description: Kills with your Solar abilities increase those abilities' damage. Stacks up to three times.
displayProperties.name: Roaring Flames

displayProperties.description: Create a large barrier that can be used to reinforce a position with cover from enemy fire.
displayProperties.name: Towering Barricade

displayProperties.description: Create a small barrier that you can peek over while aiming down sights and that increases weapon reload speed, stability, and range when you stand behind it.
displayProperties.name: Rally Barricade

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air to greater heights.
displayProperties.name: High Lift

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air with strong directional control.
displayProperties.name: Strafe Lift

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air with a strong initial burst of momentum.
displayProperties.name: Catapult Lift

displayProperties.description: A grenade that sticks to any surface and emits bolts of lightning.
displayProperties.name: Lightning Grenade

displayProperties.description: An explosive grenade that disorients enemies it damages.
displayProperties.name: Flashbang Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that periodically damages enemies inside its explosion radius.
displayProperties.name: Pulse Grenade

displayProperties.description: Supercharge your fists and slam the ground with the force of a maelstrom.
displayProperties.name: Fists of Havoc

displayProperties.description: After sprinting, for a short time, use this Melee ability to slam shoulder-first into your target and release an Arc explosion on impact.
displayProperties.name: Seismic Strike

displayProperties.description: Damaging enemies with Seismic Strike recharges your grenade.
displayProperties.name: Aftershocks

displayProperties.description: Gain an additional grenade charge. Increases the duration of grenade effects.
displayProperties.name: Magnitude

displayProperties.description: Fists of Havoc's ground slam attack leaves a damage-dealing field in its wake and deals more damage the longer it's in the air.
displayProperties.name: Terminal Velocity

displayProperties.description: Strike an enemy with this melee ability to reload your weapon and increase both your weapon stability and weapon damage.
displayProperties.name: Frontal Assault

displayProperties.description: Melee kills immediately trigger health regeneration.
displayProperties.name: Reversal

displayProperties.description: Critically wounding an enemy or breaking their shields increases your melee range and damage.
displayProperties.name: Knockout

displayProperties.description: Destroying enemies with Fists of Havoc extends its duration.
displayProperties.name: Trample

displayProperties.description: Hurtle through the air like a missile and crash into enemies to inflict meteoric damage.
displayProperties.name: Thundercrash

displayProperties.description: [Melee]  : After sprinting, leap into the air and use to slam into the ground and damage nearby targets.
displayProperties.name: Ballistic Slam

displayProperties.description: Hitting targets with Ballistic Slam grants Super energy and activates Inertia Override.
displayProperties.name: Impact Conversion

displayProperties.description: Picking up ammo during a slide reloads your equipped weapon, grants melee energy, and increases weapon damage for a short time.
displayProperties.name: Inertia Override

displayProperties.description: Dodge to perform an evasive maneuver with a steady hand. Dodging automatically reloads your weapon.
displayProperties.name: Marksman's Dodge

displayProperties.description: Dodge to perform a deft tumble, avoiding enemy attacks. Dodging near enemies fully recharges your Melee Ability.
displayProperties.name: Gambler's Dodge

displayProperties.description: While airborne, jump a second time to reach greater heights.
displayProperties.name: High Jump

displayProperties.description: While airborne, jump a second time with strong directional control.
displayProperties.name: Strafe Jump

displayProperties.description: While airborne, sustain your air control with a second or third jump.
displayProperties.name: Triple Jump

displayProperties.description: A grenade that chains bolts of lightning to nearby enemies.
displayProperties.name: Arcbolt Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that splits upon impact, creating multiple projectiles that seek enemies.
displayProperties.name: Skip Grenade

displayProperties.description: An explosive grenade that attaches to enemies.
displayProperties.name: Flux Grenade

displayProperties.description: Form a staff of pure Arc energy and acrobatically take out your foes.
displayProperties.name: Arc Staff

displayProperties.description: Kill an enemy with this melee ability to trigger health regeneration and increase your melee damage temporarily. Stacks up to 3 times.
displayProperties.name: Combination Blow

displayProperties.description: Melee kills recharge your dodge ability.
displayProperties.name: Combat Flow

displayProperties.description: Dodging increases your melee range, allowing you to lunge further to strike enemies.
displayProperties.name: Deadly Reach

displayProperties.description: After dodging, each Arc Staff hit creates a damaging lightning aftershock.
displayProperties.name: Lethal Current

displayProperties.description: Strike an enemy with this melee ability to disorient the target and nearby enemies.
displayProperties.name: Disorienting Blow

displayProperties.description: Sprinting recharges your dodge ability. Increased maximum sprint speed.
displayProperties.name: Focused Breathing

displayProperties.description: While critically wounded, melee and grenades recharge drastically faster.
displayProperties.name: Combat Meditation

displayProperties.description: You are harder to kill while dodging.
displayProperties.name: Lightning Reflexes

displayProperties.description: [Block]  : Use while wielding your Arc Staff to deflect incoming projectiles. Deflecting projectiles triples Arc Staff damage for a short time.
displayProperties.name: Whirlwind Guard

displayProperties.description: After sliding, activate this melee ability to unleash a devastating uppercut attack.
displayProperties.name: Tempest Strike

displayProperties.description: Melee hits greatly increase weapon reload speed. Dealing damage with a weapon extends the duration.
displayProperties.name: Lightning Weave

displayProperties.description: Hit a target with an Arc ability to electrify them. Meleeing electrified enemies disorients them and grants grenade, melee, and dodge energy.
displayProperties.name: Ebb and Flow

displayProperties.description: Dodge to perform an evasive maneuver with a steady hand. Dodging automatically reloads your weapon.
displayProperties.name: Marksman's Dodge

displayProperties.description: Dodge to perform a deft tumble, avoiding enemy attacks. Dodging near enemies fully recharges your Melee Ability.
displayProperties.name: Gambler's Dodge

displayProperties.description: While airborne, jump a second time to reach greater heights.
displayProperties.name: High Jump

displayProperties.description: While airborne, jump a second time with strong directional control.
displayProperties.name: Strafe Jump

displayProperties.description: While airborne, sustain your air control with a second or third jump.
displayProperties.name: Triple Jump

displayProperties.description: An explosive grenade that sticks to surfaces and detonates upon enemies who pass through its laser trigger.
displayProperties.name: Tripmine Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade whose explosion catches enemies on fire.
displayProperties.name: Incendiary Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that detonates on impact, releasing multiple drones that seek nearby enemies.
displayProperties.name: Swarm Grenade

displayProperties.description: Summon a flaming pistol that disintegrates enemies with Solar Light.
displayProperties.name: Golden Gun

displayProperties.description: Throw a knife that attaches to a surface upon impact and explodes when it detects an enemy nearby.
displayProperties.name: Proximity Explosive Knife

displayProperties.description: Precision kills increase weapon reload speed for you and nearby allies.
displayProperties.name: Chains of Woe

displayProperties.description: Significantly improves your ability to hit with Golden Gun.
displayProperties.name: Deadshot

displayProperties.description: Golden Gun can be fired quickly up to 6 times and refunds a bullet with each kill.
displayProperties.name: Six-Shooter

displayProperties.description: Throw a knife that deals extra precision damage. Precision knife kills with this melee ability immediately recharge it.
displayProperties.name: Weighted Knife

displayProperties.description: Enter a trance with each precision hit, reducing the cooldown of your Golden Gun.
displayProperties.name: Practice Makes Perfect

displayProperties.description: Precision kills increase weapon stability and handling. Your Super does more damage when cast while this buff is active with 20 or more seconds remaining.
displayProperties.name: Knock 'Em Down

displayProperties.description: Enables precision damage with Golden Gun. Precision hits with Golden Gun generate Orbs of Power, increase its damage, and extend its duration.
displayProperties.name: Line 'Em Up

displayProperties.description: Vault into the air and unleash a volley of Solar-charged explosive knives.
displayProperties.name: Blade Barrage

displayProperties.description: Throw a fan of flaming knives that burns targets on hit.
displayProperties.name: Knife Trick

displayProperties.description: Destroying burning enemies recharges Knife Trick more quickly.
displayProperties.name: Playing with Fire

displayProperties.description: While enemies burn, your dodge ability recharges faster.
displayProperties.name: The Burning Edge

displayProperties.description: Conjure a well of power that continuously heals those inside it.
displayProperties.name: Healing Rift

displayProperties.description: Conjure a well of power that increases weapon damage for those inside it.
displayProperties.name: Empowering Rift

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with strong directional control.
displayProperties.name: Strafe Glide

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to teleport a short distance.
displayProperties.name: Blink

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with a strong initial boost of speed.
displayProperties.name: Burst Glide

displayProperties.description: A grenade that splits into many submunitions and covers a large area with multiple explosions.
displayProperties.name: Scatter Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that creates a Vortex which continually damages enemies trapped inside.
displayProperties.name: Vortex Grenade

displayProperties.description: A bolt of Void Light that forks into smaller bolts on impact that seek out enemies.
displayProperties.name: Axion Bolt

displayProperties.description: Hurl an explosive bolt of Void Light at the enemy, disintegrating those caught within its blast.
displayProperties.name: Nova Bomb

displayProperties.description: Strike an enemy with this melee ability to drain your enemy's life force and use it to recharge your grenade.
displayProperties.name: Entropic Pull

displayProperties.description: [Grenade]  : Overcharge your grenade, making it deadlier and more effective.
displayProperties.name: Chaos Accelerant

displayProperties.description: Void ability kills cause enemies to explode.
displayProperties.name: Bloom

displayProperties.description: Nova Bomb travels slowly and seeks enemies. Detonations shatter into smaller seeker projectiles. Fire your weapon at the Nova Bomb to detonate it early.
displayProperties.name: Cataclysm

displayProperties.description: Kills with this melee ability fully regenerate your health. For a short time afterward, kills restore additional health.
displayProperties.name: Devour

displayProperties.description: Consume your Grenade energy to regenerate your health. Grants the Devour effect.
displayProperties.name: Feed the Void

displayProperties.description: While the Devour effect is active, killing enemies extends its duration and recharges your grenade.
displayProperties.name: Insatiable

displayProperties.description: Nova Bomb creates a singularity which continually damages enemies trapped inside. Kills with Nova Bomb grant the Devour effect.
displayProperties.name: Vortex

displayProperties.description:
Step between dimensions to subvert the laws of physics.
[Super Secondary]  : Teleport a short distance.
[Super Primary]  : Unleash a deadly Void eruption.
displayProperties.name: Nova Warp

displayProperties.description: This melee ability creates a Void explosion.
displayProperties.name: Atomic Breach

displayProperties.description: [Grenade]  : Convert your grenade into a short-range Void blast on release.
displayProperties.name: Handheld Supernova

displayProperties.description: Void ability kills grant health and melee, grenade, and class ability energy.
displayProperties.name: Dark Matter
